datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion: Infectious and Tropical Medicine Resident at Hospital Nacional Edgardo Rebagliati Martins (HNERM) by Universidad Peruana Cayetano Heredia (UPCH).

datosLaboralesPOJO.descInstitucionLaboral: STONY BROOK UNIVERSITY, NEW YORK. USA.
datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion:
1.Manage multiple complex projects/protocols systematically, with excellent interpersonal, collaborative, team building skills. Design and conduct epidemiological and clinical studies with responsibilities of coordinating ongoing research activities. 
2.Design and conduct epidemiological and clinical studies. Travel to different study sties to recruit and enroll human subjects into clinical trials.
3. Teaching activities and Manage a team. Report to IRB and PI. Write grants and papers.

datosLaboralesPOJO.descInstitucionLaboral: STONY BROOK UNIVERSITY, NEW YORK. USA.
datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion: Research in Lyme and Other Tick borne Disease among Hispanics from Long Island, NY.

datosLaboralesPOJO.descInstitucionLaboral: UNIVERSIDAD NACIONAL DE LA AMAZONIA PERUANA
datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion: Responsible for providing scientific research leadership for the undergraduate students who belongs to Sociedad Cientifica de Estudiantes de la Amazonia Peruana (SOCIEMAP), Iquitos, Peru. Lead them to write research propposals, execute fiel research, collect data, analyze data, prepare abstract/posters to scientific meetings and write manuscripts.

Vice-chair of Hospital Regional de Loreto IRB
Review research protocols
Continual Review

datosLaboralesPOJO.cargo: RESEARCH PHYSICIAN AND LOCAL SUPERVISOR (VIROLOGY & EMERGING INFECTION DEPARTMENT/ IQUITOS)
datosLaboralesPOJO.descInstitucionLaboral: CENTRO DE INVESTIGACIÓN DE ENFERMEDADES TROPICALES DE LA MARINA DE LOS EEUU (NAMRU-6)
datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion: Study Physician, local supervisor (Iquitos): Coordinate the field work with technicians, nurses and physicians, coordinate laboratory support and data presentation with Regional and National health authorities (Peruvian Ministry of Health), Evaluate  patients and participants enrolled in our studies, Quality control of data, Data analyze and preparation of scientific manuscript.

datosLaboralesPOJO.cargo: STUDY PHYSICIAN & MEDICAL MONITOR /  HOSPITAL STAFF
datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion: Evaluate patients with undifferentiated acute febrile illness and acute respiratory disease who seeks medical attention in Hospital Apoyo Santa Gema, Yurimaguas, Peru. Manage patients with dengue, leptospirosis, rickettssiosis and others tropical disease. Support and lead epidemiological investigation of transmissible outbreak in this part of the Peruvian amazon. Participate in clinical training to health workers.

datosLaboralesPOJO.cargo: MEDICAL HEAD OF PUESTO DE SALUD, PIZUQUIA
datosLaboralesPOJO.descInstitucionLaboral: RED DE SALUD CHACHAPOYAS- DIRESA AMAZONAS
datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion:
Physician in charge at this health Post (4 rural communities). 
Attending pediatris and adults ioutpatiens (communicable and non-communicable diseases)
Attending pre-natal, delivery, postpartum care in all previous pregnant woman at their home.
Extramural preventive and clinical activities in 4 communities
Prepare reports to the Regional Health Authorities: Direccion Regional de Salud Amazonas
